title: Emerald Bloom: Exquisite Diamond and Emerald Vanki Bangle
materials: 22K Yellow Gold with Hyderabadi Polish. Features a central square-cut Emerald of approximately 2 carats
complemented by high-quality Polki Diamonds (Uncut Diamonds). Estimated Diamond Carat Weight: 3.5 ct. The gold used is tested to ensure purity.
features: This Vanki Bangle showcases intricate filigree work (Jali Design) in gold, accentuated with numerous Polki Diamonds. The central Emerald is bezel-set within a floral motif of smaller diamonds, creating a captivating focal point. The openwork design provides a light and airy feel, while maintaining a solid construction for durability. It embodies the artistry of the 'Nakshi' technique, known for its delicate detailing and lifelike forms, though in a more modern interpretation.
colors: Primary Color: Yellow Gold. Secondary Colors: Vivid Green (Emerald)
White (Diamonds). The warm gold tones contrast beautifully with the vibrant green of the emerald and the dazzling sparkle of the diamonds.
